channel.title: No-ip DUC Help! (Need it to make RsPs)
channel.description:
Well I did every step it takes to make a RsPs but the no-ip, so I made an account, made a host, and downloaded DUC.
Afterwords when I sign into DUC with my no-ip account to find my host's it says "Request timed out" in red.
-_-

item.title: No-ip DUC Help! (Need it to make RsPs)
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

Q: When I ping my hostname I get a “connection timed out” error, what’s up with that?
A: A ping request is a valid test for connectivity to a network, but not DNS resolution. So as long as you see that the name resolves to a number, DNS resolution is occurring.

Source , click

Read full topic
item.source: No-ip DUC Help! (Need it to make RsPs)
